channel.title: Help not sure if this is server or client sided
channel.description:
Welcome chromeblade0!
!!Error:
The server xxxxxxxxxx is offline, it must be online before you can register it here. This is a beta for xxxxxxxxxx just thought id show friends what i have so far
the x's is my server just hiding the name. but my problem is how would i fix this?

item.title: Help not sure if this is server or client sided
item.dc:creator: @Dharma Dharma
item.description:
@Dharma wrote:

I’m pretty sure it’s both. The IP of both, server and client have to be same. If you want to use it, it has to be either 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0. If you want others to use it, it has to be you no-ip.

Read full topic
item.source: Help not sure if this is server or client sided
